Texts.Eng: From there, it's all up to you. Take what you need from my camp - within reason, of course. Good luck, I suppose, but I don't believe in luck.
Our demolitions expert, Tavish, went and set up a forward base ahead. Rendezvous with him, and he'll get you into the facility.
Personally speaking, I don't trust the looks of you, but if Lana is vouching for you I'll defer to her judgement.
So, you're the special agent Lana was going to send us?
The miniknog facility is up ahead through the swamp. A bit of a hellhole, but them's the breaks.
